author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom sink plumbing vent tips…I can’t vent this bathroom sink through the roof, so one solution is Oatey’s Sure-Vent. I solvent weld this to the 1-1/2 inch PVC and use MegaTape on the threads. This has to be accessible because it won’t last forever. And it needs to be at least 6 inches above the attic insulation 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Sink Plumbing Vent Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
